original_text: And they shall go forth, and look upon the carcases of the men that have transgressed against me: for their worm shall not die, neither shall their fire be quenched; and they shall be an abhorring unto all flesh.
korean_text: 그들이 나가서 내게 패역한 자들의 시체들을 볼 것이라 그 벌레가 죽지 아니하며 그 불이 꺼지지 아니하여 모든 혈육에게 가증함이 되리라

sentences.original_text: and look upon the carcases of the men
for their worm shall not die
neither shall their fire be quenched
and they shall be an abhorring unto all flesh
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 모든 육체에게 가증한 것이 되리라
